thread.title: Three Wire Systems Named to 2015 CRN Fast Growth 150 List
thread.title_full: Three Wire Systems Named to 2015 CRN Fast Growth 150 List

title: Three Wire Systems Named to 2015 CRN Fast Growth 150 List
text:
Three Wire Systems Named to 2015 CRN Fast Growth 150 List List Recognizes Thriving Solution Providers in the IT Channel September 14, 2015 13:03 ET | Source: Three Wire Systems, LLC 
Falls Church, VA, Sept. 14, 2015 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Three Wire Systems, LLC (Three Wire) announced that it has been named to The Channel Company's 2015 CRN速 Fast Growth 150 list. Based on gross revenue over the two-year period from 2012 to 2014, The Fast Growth 150 list ranks solution providers based in North America with significant economic growth. In a turbulent IT economy, these companies have shown exceptional prowess in growing their operations and constantly providing essential services to their customers. 
With 2014 revenue of $127 million, Three Wire has achieved 1587% growth since 2010. "Fast growth is a team accomplishment," states Three Wire President Greg Feldman. "Our growth has not just been in revenue, but in the quality of our team members and of the solutions we provide our customers. Every Three Wire employee is a part of our success, and we thank them for their contribution to receiving this honor." 
"Cloud computing, mobile and big data technologies are making the industry both more exciting and more challenging than it's ever been," says Robert Faletra, CEO of The Channel Company. "Solution providers recognized in CRN's Fast Growth 150 list are rising to meet the challenge and are thriving as a result. We are pleased to recognize these firms as leaders in today's IT channel." 
For more information on Three Wire's IT solutions, visit www.threewiresys.com . The Fast Growth 150 list is highlighted in the October issue of CRN and can be viewed online at http://www.crn.com . # # # 
About Three Wire: Three Wire Systems LLC - a service-disabled, veteran-owned small business - is a dynamic and multi-faceted IT consulting and solutions firm founded in 2006. We are the leader in eliminating wasteful spend through disruptive technologies. Particular areas of focus include reduced telecommunication spend, effective IT asset management, identification of un-deployed/underutilized software assets, and reduced power consumption. Professional services capabilities include project and program management, enterprise server and active directory support, and web application development. Our engineering expertise is centered on the IT infrastructure - compute, storage, networking, and cyber security. For more information, visit www.threewiresys.com . 
About The Channel Company: The Channel Company, with established brands including CRN速, XChange速 Events and IPED速, is the channel community's trusted authority for growth and innovation. For more than three decades, we have leveraged our proven and leading-edge platforms to deliver prescriptive sales and marketing solutions for the technology channel. The Channel Company provides Communication, Recruitment, Engagement, Enablement, Demand Generation and Intelligence services to drive technology partnerships. Learn more at www.thechannelcompany.com . Elinor Warner
